0.desc:
When no portrait frame is set
<color=#92fc63>and when an oathed ship is set as secretary ship, the oath portrait frame is displayable.</color>
0.name: Default Appearance

101.desc:
Happy 1st Anniversary! 
<color=#A7A7AAFF>Unlocked by using the New Dawn item.</color>
101.name: 1st Anniversary

102.desc:
Granted to all Commanders who have defended the port for two years.
 <color=#A7A7AAFF>earned by participating in the 2nd Anniversary limited event</color>
102.name: 2nd Anniversary

103.desc:
Granted to all Commanders who have defended the port for three years.
 <color=#A7A7AAFF>earned by participating in the 3rd Anniversary limited event</color>
103.name: 3rd Anniversary

104.desc:
Granted to all Commanders who have defended the port for four years.
<color=#ffffff>Earned by participating in the 4th Anniversary limited event.</color>
104.name: 4th Anniversary

105.desc:
Granted to all Commanders who have defended the port for five years.
<color=#A7A7AAFF>Earned by participating in the 5th Anniversary limited event.</color>
105.name: 5th Anniversary

300.desc:
<color=#ffffff>Can be unlocked by collecting points from Returnee Missions.</color>
<color=#A7A7AAFF> (Lasts for 30 days)</color>
300.name: Leader

301.desc:
<color=#ffffff>Welcome back to the Admiralty, Commander. We expect great things from you.</color>
<color=#A7A7AAFF></color>
301.name: Returnee

602.desc:
<color=#ffffff>Set sail for the best deserted island vacation ever!</color>
Awarded to Commanders who participated in the "Uncharted Summer" event.
602.name: Seabreeze Villa

603.desc:
<color=#ffffff>A piece commemorating an unforgettable soirée night, awarded to those who gracefully delivered invitations far and wide.</color>
<color=#A7A7AAFF>"Castle of Celebrations" event reward.</color>
603.name: Marvellous Invitation

10001.desc:
<color=#ffffff>Presented to Commanders who demonstrated the courage to challenge their limits.</color>
<color=#A7A7AAFF>Obtained from [Extreme Challenge] during the 6/15/23 - 6/30/23 Season.</color>
10001.name: Extreme Challenge - Gemini
